task: Create a new project outline or scope of work for a client.
Send a proposal or quotation to a prospective client.
Schedule a client meeting or consultation.
Generate and send invoices for completed work.
Track hours spent on each project for billing purposes.
Upload design drafts to a shared client folder.
Download client feedback or annotations from a shared folder.
Post updates to a project management tool or dashboard.
Collect final approval from the client on design deliverables.
Send a client satisfaction survey upon project completion.
Request testimonials or referrals from satisfied clients.
Purchase or renew software licenses for design tools.
Back up project files to a secure cloud storage.
Submit freelance tax forms or documentation.
Update portfolio with new work samples.
Share new work or achievements on professional social media.
Register for professional development courses or webinars.
Renew membership in professional design organizations.
Compile and analyze client feedback for quality improvement.
Review and update standard contract templates.
